Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>, He that entereth<S>1525</S> not<S>3361</S> by<S>1223</S> the door<S>2374</S> into<S>1519</S> the sheepfold<S>4263</S> <S>833</S>, but<S>235</S> climbeth up<S>305</S> some other way<S>237</S>, the same<S>1565</S> is<S>2076</S> a thief<S>2812</S> and<S>2532</S> a robber<S>3027</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he that entereth in<S>1525</S> by<S>1223</S> the door<S>2374</S> is<S>2076</S> the shepherd<S>4166</S> of the sheep<S>4263</S>.
To him<S>5129</S> the porter<S>2377</S> openeth<S>455</S>; and<S>2532</S> the sheep<S>4263</S> hear<S>191</S> his<S>846</S> voice<S>5456</S>: and<S>2532</S> he calleth<S>2564</S> his own<S>2398</S> sheep<S>4263</S> by<S>2596</S> name<S>3686</S>, and<S>2532</S> leadeth<S>1806</S> them<S>846</S> out<S>1806</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when<S>3752</S> he putteth forth<S>1544</S> his own<S>2398</S> sheep<S>4263</S>, he goeth<S>4198</S> before<S>1715</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> the sheep<S>4263</S> follow<S>190</S> him<S>846</S>: for<S>3754</S> they know<S>1492</S> his<S>846</S> voice<S>5456</S>.
And<S>1161</S> a stranger<S>245</S> will they<S>190</S> not<S>3364</S> follow<S>190</S>, but<S>235</S> will flee<S>5343</S> from<S>575</S> him<S>846</S>: for<S>3754</S> they know<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> the voice<S>5456</S> of strangers<S>245</S>.
This<S>5026</S> parable<S>3942</S> spake<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto them<S>846</S>: but<S>1161</S> they<S>1565</S> understood<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> what things<S>5101</S> they were<S>2258</S> which<S>3739</S> he spake<S>2980</S> unto them<S>846</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> said<S>2036</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto them<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S>, Verily<S>281</S>, verily<S>281</S>, I say<S>3004</S> unto you<S>5213</S>,<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the door<S>2374</S> of the sheep<S>4263</S>.
All<S>3956</S> that ever<S>3745</S> came<S>2064</S> before<S>4253</S> me<S>1700</S> are<S>1526</S> thieves<S>2812</S> and<S>2532</S> robbers<S>3027</S>: but<S>235</S> the sheep<S>4263</S> did<S>191</S> not<S>3756</S> hear<S>191</S> them<S>846</S>.
I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the door<S>2374</S>: by<S>1223</S> me<S>1700</S> if<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> enter in<S>1525</S>, he shall be saved<S>4982</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall go in<S>1525</S> and<S>2532</S> out<S>1831</S>, and<S>2532</S> find<S>2147</S> pasture<S>3542</S>.
The thief<S>2812</S> cometh<S>2064</S> not<S>3756</S>, but<S>1508</S> for to<S>2443</S> steal<S>2813</S>, and<S>2532</S> to kill<S>2380</S>, and<S>2532</S> to destroy<S>622</S>: I<S>1473</S> am come<S>2064</S> that<S>2443</S> they might have<S>2192</S> life<S>2222</S>, and<S>2532</S> that they might have<S>2192</S> it more abundantly<S>4053</S>.
I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the good<S>2570</S> shepherd<S>4166</S>: the good<S>2570</S> shepherd<S>4166</S> giveth<S>5087</S> his<S>846</S> life<S>5590</S> for<S>5228</S> the sheep<S>4263</S>.
But<S>1161</S> he that is<S>5607</S> an hireling<S>3411</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3756</S> the shepherd<S>4166</S>, whose<S>3739</S> own<S>2398</S> the sheep<S>4263</S> are<S>1526</S> not<S>3756</S>, seeth<S>2334</S> the wolf<S>3074</S> coming<S>2064</S>, and<S>2532</S> leaveth<S>863</S> the sheep<S>4263</S>, and<S>2532</S> fleeth<S>5343</S>: and<S>2532</S> the wolf<S>3074</S> catcheth<S>726</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> scattereth<S>4650</S> the sheep<S>4263</S>.
<S>1161</S> The hireling<S>3411</S> fleeth<S>5343</S>, because<S>3754</S> he is<S>2076</S> an hireling<S>3411</S>, and<S>2532</S> <S>846</S> careth<S>3199</S> not<S>3756</S> for<S>4012</S> the sheep<S>4263</S>.
I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> the good<S>2570</S> shepherd<S>4166</S>, and<S>2532</S> know<S>1097</S> my<S>1699</S> sheep, and<S>2532</S> am known<S>1097</S> of<S>5259</S> mine<S>1699</S>.
As<S>2531</S> the Father<S>3962</S> knoweth<S>1097</S> me<S>3165</S>, even so<S>2504</S> know<S>1097</S> I<S>2504</S> the Father<S>3962</S>: and<S>2532</S> I lay down<S>5087</S> my<S>3450</S> life<S>5590</S> for<S>5228</S> the sheep<S>4263</S>.
And<S>2532</S> other<S>243</S> sheep<S>4263</S> I have<S>2192</S>, which<S>3739</S> are<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> this<S>5026</S> fold<S>833</S>: them also<S>2548</S> I<S>3165</S> must<S>1163</S> bring<S>71</S>, and<S>2532</S> they shall hear<S>191</S> my<S>3450</S> voice<S>5456</S>; and<S>2532</S> there shall be<S>1096</S> one<S>3391</S> fold<S>4167</S>, and one<S>1520</S> shepherd<S>4166</S>.
Therefore<S>5124</S> <S>1223</S> doth<S>25</S> my Father<S>3962</S> love<S>25</S> me<S>3165</S>, because<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> lay down<S>5087</S> my<S>3450</S> life<S>5590</S>, that<S>2443</S> I might take<S>2983</S> it<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S>.
No man<S>3762</S> taketh<S>142</S> it<S>846</S> from<S>575</S> me<S>1700</S>, but<S>235</S> I<S>1473</S> lay<S>5087</S> it<S>846</S> down<S>5087</S> of<S>575</S> myself<S>1683</S>. I have<S>2192</S> power<S>1849</S> to lay<S>5087</S> it<S>846</S> down<S>5087</S>, and<S>2532</S> I have<S>2192</S> power<S>1849</S> to take<S>2983</S> it<S>846</S> again<S>3825</S>. This<S>5026</S> commandment<S>1785</S> have I received<S>2983</S> of<S>3844</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>.
There was<S>1096</S> a division<S>4978</S> therefore<S>3767</S> again<S>3825</S> among<S>1722</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> for<S>1223</S> these<S>5128</S> sayings<S>3056</S>.
And<S>1161</S> many<S>4183</S> of<S>1537</S> them<S>846</S> said<S>3004</S>, He hath<S>2192</S> a devil<S>1140</S>, and<S>2532</S> is mad<S>3105</S>; why<S>5101</S> hear ye<S>191</S> him<S>846</S>?
Others<S>243</S> said<S>3004</S>, These<S>5023</S> are<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> the words<S>4487</S> of him that hath a devil<S>1139</S>. Can<S>3361</S> <S>1410</S> a devil<S>1140</S> open<S>455</S> the eyes<S>3788</S> of the blind<S>5185</S>?
And<S>1161</S> it was<S>1096</S> at<S>1722</S> Jerusalem<S>2414</S> the feast of the dedication<S>1456</S>, and<S>2532</S> it was<S>2258</S> winter<S>5494</S>.
And<S>2532</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> walked<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>2411</S> in<S>1722</S> Solomon's<S>4672</S> porch<S>4745</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> came<S>2944</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> round about<S>2944</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S> unto him<S>846</S>, How long<S>2193</S> <S>4219</S> dost thou make<S>142</S> us<S>2257</S> to doubt<S>5590</S>? If<S>1487</S> thou<S>4771</S> be<S>1488</S> the Christ<S>5547</S>, tell<S>2036</S> us<S>2254</S> plainly<S>3954</S>. <sup>make: or, hold us in suspense</sup>
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, I told<S>2036</S> you<S>5213</S>, and<S>2532</S> ye believed<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S>: the works<S>2041</S> that<S>3739</S> I<S>1473</S> do<S>4160</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> Father's<S>3962</S> name<S>3686</S>, they<S>5023</S> bear witness<S>3140</S> of<S>4012</S> me<S>1700</S>.
But<S>235</S> ye<S>5210</S> believe<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S>, because<S>1063</S> ye are<S>2075</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> my<S>1699</S> sheep<S>4263</S>, as<S>2531</S> I said<S>2036</S> unto you<S>5213</S>.
My<S>1699</S> sheep<S>4263</S> hear<S>191</S> my<S>3450</S> voice<S>5456</S>, and I<S>2504</S> know<S>1097</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> they follow<S>190</S> me<S>3427</S>:
And I<S>2504</S> give<S>1325</S> unto them<S>846</S> eternal<S>166</S> life<S>2222</S>; and<S>2532</S> they shall<S>622</S> never<S>3364</S> <S>1519</S> <S>165</S> perish<S>622</S>, neither<S>2532</S> <S>3756</S> shall<S>726</S> any<S>5100</S> man pluck<S>726</S> them<S>846</S> out of<S>1537</S> my<S>3450</S> hand<S>5495</S>.
My<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>, which<S>3739</S> gave<S>1325</S> them me<S>3427</S>, is<S>2076</S> greater than<S>3187</S> all<S>3956</S>; and<S>2532</S> no<S>3762</S> man is able<S>1410</S> to pluck<S>726</S> them out of<S>1537</S> my<S>3450</S> Father's<S>3962</S> hand<S>5495</S>.
I<S>1473</S> and<S>2532</S> my Father<S>3962</S> are<S>2070</S> one<S>1520</S>.
Then<S>3767</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> took up<S>941</S> stones<S>3037</S> again<S>3825</S> to<S>2443</S> stone<S>3034</S> him<S>846</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, Many<S>4183</S> good<S>2570</S> works<S>2041</S> have I shewed<S>1166</S> you<S>5213</S> from<S>1537</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>; for<S>1223</S> which<S>4169</S> of those<S>846</S> works<S>2041</S> do ye stone<S>3034</S> me<S>3165</S>?
The Jews<S>2453</S> answered<S>611</S> him<S>846</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, For<S>4012</S> a good<S>2570</S> work<S>2041</S> we stone<S>3034</S> thee<S>4571</S> not<S>3756</S>; but<S>235</S> for<S>4012</S> blasphemy<S>988</S>; and<S>2532</S> because<S>3754</S> that thou<S>4771</S>, being<S>5607</S> a man<S>444</S>, makest<S>4160</S> thyself<S>4572</S> God<S>2316</S>.
Jesus<S>2424</S> answered<S>611</S> them<S>846</S>, Is it<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> your<S>5216</S> law<S>3551</S>, I<S>1473</S> said<S>2036</S>, Ye are<S>2075</S> gods<S>2316</S>?
If<S>1487</S> he called<S>2036</S> them<S>1565</S> gods<S>2316</S>, unto<S>4314</S> whom<S>3739</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2316</S> came<S>1096</S>, and<S>2532</S> the scripture<S>1124</S> cannot<S>3756</S> <S>1410</S> be broken<S>3089</S>;
Say<S>3004</S> ye<S>5210</S> of him, whom<S>3739</S> the Father<S>3962</S> hath sanctified<S>37</S>, and<S>2532</S> sent<S>649</S> into<S>1519</S> the world<S>2889</S>,<S>3754</S> Thou blasphemest<S>987</S>; because<S>3754</S> I said<S>2036</S>, I am<S>1510</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>?
If<S>1487</S> I do<S>4160</S> not<S>3756</S> the works<S>2041</S> of my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>, believe<S>4100</S> me<S>3427</S> not<S>3361</S>.
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> I do<S>4160</S>, though<S>2579</S> ye believe<S>4100</S> not<S>3361</S> me<S>1698</S>, believe<S>4100</S> the works<S>2041</S>: that<S>2443</S> ye may know<S>1097</S>, and<S>2532</S> believe<S>4100</S>, that<S>3754</S> the Father<S>3962</S> is in<S>1722</S> me<S>1698</S>, and I<S>2504</S> in<S>1722</S> him<S>846</S>.
Therefore<S>3767</S> they sought<S>2212</S> again<S>3825</S> to take<S>4084</S> him<S>846</S>: but<S>2532</S> he escaped<S>1831</S> out of<S>1537</S> their<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S>,
And<S>2532</S> went away<S>565</S> again<S>3825</S> beyond<S>4008</S> Jordan<S>2446</S> into<S>1519</S> the place<S>5117</S> where<S>3699</S> John<S>2491</S> at first<S>4412</S> baptized<S>907</S> <S>2258</S>; and<S>2532</S> there<S>1563</S> he abode<S>3306</S>.
And<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> resorted<S>2064</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> John<S>2491</S> did<S>4160</S> no<S>3303</S> <S>3762</S> miracle<S>4592</S>: but<S>1161</S> all things<S>3956</S> that<S>3745</S> John<S>2491</S> spake<S>2036</S> of<S>4012</S> this man<S>5127</S> were<S>2258</S> true<S>227</S>.
And<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> believed<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him<S>846</S> there<S>1563</S>.
